getSubDomain: select SubDomain_Code,SubDomain_Long_Name,SubDomain_Desc,Active_Ind_YN,UpdatedBy_UserId from DataEngineering.SubDomainMstr_Tbl where Domain_Code = @domain and Active_Ind_YN = @isActive
getAppCodes: select DataSource_App_Code , DataSource_App_Abb_Name,DataSource_App_Desc from SourceSetup.DataSourceAppmaster where Domain_Code= @domain and SubDomain_Code = @subDomain
